Package com.athgri.finalproject.dtoController

Class CarController

java.lang.Object
com.athgri.finalproject.dtoController.CarController
@RestController @RequestMapping("api/car") public class CarController extends Object
The CarController class handles car-related API endpoints.

  • Method Details

    • getAllCars

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Car>> getAllCars()
      Retrieves a list of all cars.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of cars or a NOT_FOUND status if the list is empty

    • getUserById

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/find/id/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Car> getUserById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Retrieves a car by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the car to be retrieved
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the car or a NOT_FOUND status if the car is not found

    • findCarsByIds

      @CrossOrigin @PostMapping("/find/list") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Car>> findCarsByIds(@RequestBody List<Long> ids)
      Retrieves a list of cars by their unique identifiers.
      Parameters:
      ids - The list of unique identifiers of the cars.
      Returns:
      A list of cars with the specified IDs.

    • getUserById

      @CrossOrigin @GetMapping("/find/name/{name}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Car>> getUserById(@PathVariable("name") String carName)
      Retrieves a list of cars by their name.
      Parameters:
      carName - the name of the cars to be retrieved
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of cars or a NOT_FOUND status if the list is empty

    • addCar

      @CrossOrigin @PostMapping("/add") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Car> addCar(@RequestBody Car car)
      Adds a new car.
      Parameters:
      car - the car to be added
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added car or a NOT_ACCEPTABLE status if the operation fails

    • updateCar

      @CrossOrigin @PutMapping("/update/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Car> updateCar(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody Car car)
      Updates an existing car.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the car to be updated
      car - the updated car information
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated car or a NOT_ACCEPTABLE status if the operation fails

    • deleteCar

      @CrossOrigin @DeleteMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteCar(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Deletes a car by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the car to be deleted
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the result of the deletion operation
